name: Rompetechos
overview: The aim of the game is to avoid a fine from Treasury, sending today a letter with some docs. He has only two hours to do the task, putting the letter into a mailbox, stamped, of course. But Rompetechos lost the letter somewhere, so he must find it first. Once found, he needs a stamp, so the seeking starts again. The letter can be anywhere inside the buildings (even into dark places... ) or means of transport, and the stamp can be found only in any furniture. The controls are very simple, left & right, and action, this means check the time, examine things, enter/go out places, go up/down stairs, talk, change to other street...
